CustomField.formula: IF(NokiaCPQ_Environment_Access_Type__c = 'PRM', IF(NokiaCPQ_DOD_Per__c == 0,HYPERLINK(NokiaCPQ_Environment_Access_URL__c & "/Apttus_QPConfig__ProposalConfiguration?id=" &Id & "&flow=NewUIReadOnlyPartner" & "&mode=readOnly" & "&cntrNbr_1="&Project_Price_List_Number__c, IMAGE("/resource/Button_Configure_Custom_View", "View Products/Pricing"),"_self"), IF(NokiaCPQ_DOD_Per__c>0 && NokiaCPQ_DPD_Per__c==0, HYPERLINK(NokiaCPQ_Environment_Access_URL__c & "/Apttus_QPConfig__ProposalConfiguration?id=" &Id & "&flow=NewUIReadOnlyWithDOD" & "&mode=readOnly" & "&cntrNbr_1="&Project_Price_List_Number__c, IMAGE("/resource/Button_Configure_Custom_View", "View Products/Pricing"),"_self"), IF(NokiaCPQ_DPD_Per__c>0,HYPERLINK(NokiaCPQ_Environment_Access_URL__c & "/Apttus_QPConfig__ProposalConfiguration?id=" &Id & "&flow=NewUIReadOnlyWithDODDPD" & "&mode=readOnly" & "&cntrNbr_1="&Project_Price_List_Number__c, IMAGE("/resource/Button_Configure_Custom_View", "View Products/Pricing"),"_self"),null))),HYPERLINK("/apex/Apttus_QPConfig__ProposalConfiguration?id=" &Id & "&flow=NewUIReadOnly" & "&mode=readOnly" & "&cntrNbr_1="&Project_Price_List_Number__c, IMAGE("/resource/Button_Configure_Custom_View","View Products/Pricing"),"_self"))
CustomField.label: View Products/Pricing
